original_title: 仮面ライダーフォーゼ クライマックスエピソード
overview: After the 39th and 40th Astroswitches are developed, Amanogawa and Subaruboshi High Schools hold a test transfer of some of AGHS's students to SBHS, which causes problems when the Aries Zodiarts makes itself known to the AGHS students. Kamen Rider Fourze: Climax Episode is the director's cut version of the combined episodes 31 & 32 of the Kamen Rider Fourze TV series.
title: Kamen Rider Fourze: Climax Episode
